A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Such a big promise\, great cast\, all that nostalgia - It should have been awesome\, but it just didn't resonate. I love the franchise\, but I simply couldn't care less about the characters\, something in the direction of the story was off.
That scene with Lea was the thing that killed my "Suspension of disbelief".
The uninteresting arc\, was a buzz kill and a waste of time.
I love that the movie was trying to be "deeper"\, but it did this poorly.
